scripts.build: npm run build:debug && npm run build:release
scripts.build:debug: mkdir -p dist/debug && zig build-lib -mcpu=baseline -ODebug -dynamic -lc -isystem deps/node-$(node --version)/include/node src/addon.zig -fallow-shlib-undefined -femit-bin=dist/debug/addon.node
scripts.build:release: mkdir -p dist/release && zig build-lib -mcpu=baseline -OReleaseFast -dynamic -lc -isystem deps/node-$(node --version)/include/node src/addon.zig -fallow-shlib-undefined -femit-bin=dist/release/addon.node
